name: The Hollow Girls
description:
Set in a dark fantasy world where hideous creatures prowl gloomy forests, witches gobble down lost little children and jealous stepmothers murder their husbands' offspring, The Hollow Girls is a 2D point-and-click adventure as gnarled and twisted as the fingers of a corpse. Inspired by Grimms' Fairytales and the haunting music of Emily Portman, The Hollow Girls seeks to unsettle... and delight.

What you see here is a prototype, but I'd be interested in building on it in the future (should the game garner enough interest). If you decide to download and play it, I'd love to hear your thoughts. Thanks for looking!
